champion_battle_option_description_2120_: Increases the strength of all opposing sync pairs by the equivalent of [Digit:6digits ] level(s).
At the start of battle, the Gradual Healing effect is applied to all opposing sync pairs.
At the start of battle, the opponents’ field of play gains permanent physical damage reduction.
At the start of battle, the opponents’ field of play gains permanent special damage reduction.
At the start of battle, the opponents’ field of play gains permanent critical-hit defense.
Increases the effectiveness of sync buffs that opponents receive by [Digit:6digits ]%.
The total number of moves opponents need to use before they can unleash a sync move is reduced by [Digit:6digits ].
Reduces allied sync pairs’ move gauge maximum by [Digit:6digits ].
At the start of battle, reduces the HP of all allied sync pairs by [Digit:6digits ]% of their maximum HP.
Raises the Attack and Sp. Atk of all opposing sync pairs by [Digit:6digits ]%.
Raises the Defense and Sp. Def of all opposing sync pairs by [Digit:6digits ]%.
Raises the maximum HP of all opposing sync pairs by [Digit:6digits ]%.
Opponents become immune to status conditions.
Opponents become immune to all stat-lowering effects.
Reduces the HP restored by allies’ healing moves by [Digit:6digits ]%.
Halves the MP of all allied sync pairs.
Every time an opponent’s attack is successful, powers up that opponent’s attacks by [Digit:6digits ]%.
